name: Dicey Escape (OSteiner, noamco12)
description:
You are Dicey a malfunctioned die that got tossed into a dungeon to rot.

Escape the dark dungeon using your magnet.

Control Scheme:

W - Roll North

S - Roll South

A - Roll West

D - Roll East

E - Toggle Magnetic force

R - Reset Level

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

We hope that you enjoy it, we practically had only one day of development thus we didn't get to develop a lot of levels.

Special Thanks:
Yonatan - Main Menu

Itai Matos - SFX & Music (https://www.itaimatos.com/)
